column2: "We managed to make it all the way back here, the Dragon Altar. Patty at your service!"
"What you just said really has nothing to do with anything, but whatever, Tea here."
"Introducing myself and where we are at the same time, two birds with one stone, right?"
"But still, the sacred grounds to the Dragonkin, this Dragon Altar, I never expected to be able to enter here."
"You're right, we may be here to get rid of Dragonkin infected by Darkers, but I suppose that means they trust us."
"The reason that the Dragonkin are able to trust us is really all because of you."
"Because the Elder Dragonkin have recognized you, they've also allowed other ARKS to enter this area."
"Those are results that I think you should be proud of, but from the perspective of the higher ups, it might be suspicious."
"Yeah, that's so rude, you're the one who got rid of the Dragonkin's grudge against us, you think that'd be commendable!"
"But still, you can't let your guard down! It's not like all of the Dragonkin are friendly, that woman said something like that."
"There are still a lot of Dragonkin who view ARKS as an enemy, so be careful as you progress through here!"
"After that, we were bored to tears being lectured for nearly an hour about the Dragonkin."
